data.title: Pacific Hydro Pty Ltd. (Pacific Hydro)
data.meta_description: Pacific Hydro, owned by Chinese energy group State Power Investment Corporation (SPIC), is a renewable hydro and wind energy company. Headquartered in Melbourne, Australia, Pacific Hydro has 19 operations with a total installed capacity of 713MW in Chile, Aust...
data.text: Get all the information about Pacific Hydro Pty Ltd. (Pacific Hydro), a company operating mainly in the Electric Power sector. Connect with its key contacts, projects, shareholders, related news and more. The company has operations in Australia, which include Tidal/Wave energy, Thermosolar CSP, Mini Hydro, Onshore Wind, Offshore Wind, Photovoltaic, Water levels, Biomass, Wind, Solar, Geothermal, Renewable, Run of the river, Electric Power Producer, Hydro and Hydro Dam. Write to us at info@bnamericas.com or call us at +56 (2) 29410300 to schedule a demonstration of our platform.
